title: Wild For Her
description: All bets are off when a hotshot firefighter and a homecoming queen whose crown slipped off meet in the wilds of Alaska.Graham takes broody to the next level. Busy fighting fires in the wilds of Alaska and raising his daughter, he doesn't have time for romance. He definitely doesn't have time for Madison, his new neighbor.Madison is about as out of her element in Alaska as a fish hiking a mountain. This homecoming queen lost her crown back in Texas, and Graham figures that's where she belongs. Except it only takes one kiss to set a thousand fires. He can't forget that kiss and ignoring Madison turns out to be impossible.Enjoy this FREE preview to Graham & Madison's smokin' hot opposites attract romance!Graham & Madison's story is perfect for readers who love small town romance, hotshot firefighters, sassy heroines, single fathers, neighbors, frenemies to lovers, opposites attract, slow burn, emotional romance with a dash of angst, plenty of steam and swoon, and a grumpy, fiercely protective hero.
author: J.H. Croix
